alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 542 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Steinhatchee, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Steinhatchee, Hines, Jonesboro and Jena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie
